lines.text: I just have to have you here a little longer.
Why? What more can I do? What more can you want?
You know what I want... it's what I've always wanted. You could fall in love with me if you tried. I've done everything I could to make it easy. You just won't try!
What's got four ears and eight legs?
Don't worry. I'll respect your every privacy.
There'd be a blooming lot more of this sort of thing, if more people had the time and the money.
